modName: No Health and Reduced Magicka Regeneration
summary: simple modification to races.  0 health regen and 10% vanilla magicka regen
descriptionHtml:
I could not find a mod that reduces mana regen outside of combat.
I hope i did not miss any that already exist.  

This should make potions and any food mod that boosts mana regen more valuable.
I might make slight modifications or alternate files by request if asked nicely!
This is a basic modification to races.

PLEASE NOTE:
Changing core race values can have many unknown and undesired effects. 
As with any mod, it is recommended that you take a few precautions before installing this mod.
Be sure to create a safe SAVED GAME before installing this, if at any time you feel this mod is not right for you, you will want to be able to go back to this save if your save games have been corrupted.

The files offer these changes to race values.

REGENREDUX

- Health Regen set to 0% 
- Mana Regen set to 10% vanilla
- Base mana pools doubled
- Dragonskin duration set to 5 min from 1 min

LITE VERSION -  Only changes Mana and Health Regen

- Health Regen set to 0% 
- Mana Regen set to 10% vanilla

SloManaRegen - Only changes mana Regen

- Mana Regen set to 10% vanilla

--------------------------------------------------
I did not include the following options... because other modders have already done the work for these mods and deserve the credit.  You can find:

Seperate No health Regen at
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9972
by StannieDum

Combat mana control (slower and faster regen) at
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=545
By Astark
author: Lodakai
